AI_PROMPTS.LANGUAGE_INSTRUCTION: **LANGUAGE:** Respond in English. Generate titles, descriptions and other texts in English (not the labels from the vocabulary - these must be used exactly as given).

EXTRACTION.HEADER: Extract the following metadata field from the text:
EXTRACTION.EXAMPLES_HINT: Use these examples as a guide!
EXTRACTION.RESPONSE_FORMAT: Respond ONLY with a JSON object in the format:
EXTRACTION.NULL_HINT: Use null if the value cannot be extracted.
EXTRACTION.MULTIPLE_OBJECTS: For multiple values use an array of objects:
EXTRACTION.MULTIPLE_ARRAY: For multiple values use an array:
EXACT_LABEL_RULES: Return ONLY the label exactly as given above (in quotes)
NO additional words, additions or custom additions in brackets
If the original label contains brackets or hyphens, keep them unchanged
If you recognize an alternative label, use the main label
If NONE of the labels fit, return null

RETRY.VOCABULARY_HINT: Choose exactly one of the labels listed above. The label must match exactly, including multi-word terms or additions in brackets.
RETRY.DEFAULT_HINT: Provide a valid value according to the field description.
RETRY.FORMATTING: No additional words, no paraphrasing, only the pure label in the JSON value.

NORMALIZATION.HEADER: You are a data normalizer. Your task is to format user input into the correct format.
NORMALIZATION.IMPORTANT: **IMPORTANT: You should NOT re-evaluate or interpret the value, only format it!**
NORMALIZATION.VOCABULARY_HINT: **IMPORTANT: This field has a controlled vocabulary ({{type}} vocabulary)**
NORMALIZATION.CLOSED_VOCABULARY: ‚ö†Ô∏è **CLOSED VOCABULARY** - ONLY these exact labels are allowed!
NORMALIZATION.RESPONSE_HINT: Respond ONLY with a JSON value, without additional text!
NORMALIZATION.EXACT_CASE: Use EXACT capitalization from the vocabulary list!

CONTENT_TYPE.HEADER: Analyze the following text and determine the most appropriate content type.
CONTENT_TYPE.AVAILABLE_TYPES: Available content types with their definitions:
REASONING_RULES: Refer explicitly to the definitions above
Explain which key features of the definition are met in the text
For borderline cases: Explain why this category fits better than others
Use technical terms from the definitions (e.g., "time-limited", "structured learning program", "competency development")
CONTENT_TYPE.RESPONSE_FORMAT: Respond ONLY with a JSON object in the format:
CONTENT_TYPE.REASON_LENGTH: The reason should be max. 15-20 words.
